entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:47 a.m. MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, n/a
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 12:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Visibility: 56 km
Dewpoint: -24.6°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
